explains: v. 灌溉；冲洗（尤指伤口）；使清新

sentences.en: The lines were thought to have been a system of canals that had been built to irrigate the surface.
sentences.cn: 这些管道被认为是用来灌溉地表的运河系统。

sentences.en: He wants to use the water to irrigate barren desert land.
sentences.cn: 他想用该水来灌溉贫瘠的沙漠土地。

sentences.en: None of the water from Lake Powell is used to irrigate the area.
sentences.cn: 鲍威尔湖的水没有被用来灌溉这一地区。
